meanings.sent1: I need to reregister for the class since I missed the deadline.
meanings.sent2: Students must reregister for the next semester to continue their studies.
meanings.sent3: After forgetting to reregister, I had to beg the professor for a spot in the course.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm to reregister for the event was like a burst of energy.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to reregister your car before the expiration date to avoid fines.

meanings.sent1: The system prompted me to reregister my information for security purposes.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to reregister your details if there are any changes.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally deleted my account and had to reregister all over again.
meanings.sent4: The decision to reregister for the program was a fresh start for me.
meanings.sent5: You can easily reregister for the workshop by following the online instructions.

meanings.definition: To sign up or enter again.
meanings.sent1: If you want to participate, you will need to reregister for the competition.
meanings.sent2: Athletes must reregister for the tournament to secure their spot.
meanings.sent3: I had to reregister for the race after missing the initial registration deadline.
meanings.sent4: The opportunity to reregister for the event was a chance for redemption.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to reregister for the workshop before all the spots are filled.
